Comment: Add new hooks for global level (@BeforeAll and @AfterAll) that run only once before all and after all existing features/scenarios. Unit test and cucumber test to cover the new hooks and the running order between hooks. An execution flow with the new hooks looks like this: 1 - @BeforeAll hook(s) (runs before all features once) 2 - @Before hook(s) (no change, same behavior - before every scenario or tagged scenarios) 3 - @After hook(s) (no change, same behavior - after every scenario or tagged scenarios) 4 - .... 2 and 3 for all scenarios in a feature 5 - @AfterAll hook(s) (runs once after all the features are run)

Comment: Add new hooks for global level (@BeforeAll and @AfterAll) that run only once before all and after all existing features/scenarios. Unit test and cucumber test to cover the new hooks and the running order between hooks. An execution flow with the new hooks looks like this: 1 - @BeforeAll hook(s) (runs before all features once) 2 - @Before hook(s) (no change, same behavior - before every scenario or tagged scenarios) 3 - @After hook(s) (no change, same behavior - after every scenario or tagged scenarios) 4 - .... 2 and 3 for all scenarios in a feature 5 - @AfterAll hook(s) (runs once after all the features are run)

Comment: Add new hooks for global level (@BeforeAll and @AfterAll) that run only once before all and after all existing features/scenarios. Unit test and cucumber test to cover the new hooks and the running order between hooks. An execution flow with the new hooks looks like this: 1 - @BeforeAll hook(s) (runs before all features once) 2 - @Before hook(s) (no change, same behavior - before every scenario or tagged scenarios) 3 - @After hook(s) (no change, same behavior - after every scenario or tagged scenarios) 4 - .... 2 and 3 for all scenarios in a feature 5 - @AfterAll hook(s) (runs once after all the features are run)
